titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for adoption expenses in excess of 7.5 percent of adjusted gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/16/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for adoption expenses in excess of 7.5 percent of adjusted gross income.
